column5: The elegant Grand Manor, built in 1905, a true southern tropical mansion. Luxurious amenities seamlessly blended with Victorian grace. Located in Galveston's East End Historic District & is considered one of the top architectural structures on the Island.Guest rooms are richly appointed, with king size beds. Private baths are Jacuzzi or claw-footed tubs.  Best walking location B&B on Island . The beach,Funky bars & rooftop patios minutes away at WORLD FAMOUS STRAND . (2 other rooms available)
column8: Grand Manor Luxury Mansion Suites- Loft suite
